name: Convallaria majalis
Relationship: Compare: DIGIT.; CRATAEG.; LILIUM; ADONIS (feeble heart action due only to functional disturbance).

Heart: Feeling as if heart beat throughout the chest
SENSATION AS IF HEART CEASED BEATING, THEN STARTING VERY SUDDENLY
Tobacco heart, especially when due to cigarettes
Pain and aching in lumbar region; aching of legs; in big toe
Fever: Chilly in back and down spine, followed by fever, little sweat
Abdomen: Gurgling and pain on taking deep breath
Movement in abdomen like fist of a child
Face: Hydroa in nose and lips; raw and sore
Sees imaginary gray spot about three inches square
Throat: Raw feeling in back of throat when inspiring
Mouth: Grating of teeth in the morning
Tongue feels sore and scalded; broad and thick with heavy, dirty coating
Female: Great SORENESS IN UTERINE REGION, WITH SYMPATHETIC PALPITATION OF HEART
Pain in sacroiliac joints, running down leg
Itching of urinary meatus and vaginal orifice

details: A heart remedy. Increases energy of heart's action, renders it more regular. Of use when the ventricles are over distended and dilatation begins, and when there is an absence of compensatory hypertrophy, and when venous stasis is marked. Dyspnoea, dropsy, oneiric tendency. ANASARCA.Heart disease with vertigo and digestive disturbances.
dosage: Third attenuation, and for symptoms of heart failure, tincture, one to fifteen drops.
